panda.cast

Class AbstractCastor<S,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • panda.cast.AbstractCastor<S,T>
  • Type Parameters:
    S - source type
    T - target type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Castor<S,T>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AnyObjectCastor, ArrayCastor, CollectionCastor, IterableCastor, IteratorCastor, JsonArrayCastor, TimeZoneCastor

    public abstract class AbstractCastor<S,T>
extends Object
implements Castor<S,T>
    Castor interface
